description:
Taiki gets his own soul sent to Prison Land to bring back the souls of Shoutmon, Dorulumon, and Ballistamon. Soon he finds himself under the attack of the souls of the seven Death Generals, who overwhelm Taiki`s Digimon in power. Taiki is in a tight spot... when Olegmon realizes that the Death Generals are not his true friends and, along with the just Apollomon, joins Taiki`s side! Does Taiki stand a chance against the other five Death Generals with their help?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Digital World no Mirai no Tame ni! Death General to no Yuujou!
For the Digital World`s Future! Friendship with Death Generals!
デジタルワールドの未来のために! デスジェネラルとの友情!
